name: WhoReacted
description: Shows the avatars of the users who reacted to a message.

changelog.title: So many settings
items: Added settings to let you decide whether you want to hide or show yourself and/or bots in the reactors (Thanks @FichteFoll on GitHub).
Added setting to set the avatars size (Thanks @FichteFoll on GitHub).
Categorized the settings for better organization and easier access.

changelog.title: I knew I shouldn't mess with the comparisons
items: Fixed setting to not show yourself not working for everyone (Thanks again @FichteFoll on GitHub).
